name: We Might Be Connected, Nozomi Tojo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 6 cards from the top of your deck, choose 3 cards from among them, put them into your waiting room, and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, all of your other characters get +1 soul until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Hmph. Will you really not look at me unless I'm right next to you?

name: “Venue Guiding Secrets” Eli Ayase
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room. If you do, choose 1 card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it into their stock. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Choose 1 card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock."
flavorText: Later, let's take my best route around the venue!

name: “Goddess of Flowers” Nozomi Tojo
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named ""Angelic Angel" Nozomi Tojo" in your deck. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 green character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Pink tulips represent faithful love in the language of flowers, so maybe a lot of you who just raised your hands are faithful people!

name: White Swan, Eli Ayase
text: 【CONT】 If you have 3 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent puts all of their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock.
flavorText: Thank you. You're so kind. That's what I love about you.

name: I'll Capture All Your Hearts♪ Nico Yazawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "We Are A Single Light" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's clock."
flavorText: Thank you. I had a lot of fun spending time with you today.

name: “Grace Over Flowers♪” Nico Yazawa
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: What's the point of us being awed by the cheers? We can't lose out to the excitement of the audience!

name: Moonlit Prayer, Umi Sonoda
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText:
U-U-Um, why, uh...is there only one straw for the two of us?
And why is it heart-shaped?!

name: “Wonderful Job as MC” Honoka Kosaka
text: 【AUTO】 [Return 2 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Alright, let's go for a Flower Shower!

name: Keep It a Secret, Kotori Minami
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I-I'm fine... I was just a bit startled. Thanks for catching me.

name: Our Destination's a Secret! Honoka Kosaka
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: *Giggle* When you really get into something, you lose sight of everything around you. I learned something new about you!

name: “Guiding Is My Forte” Umi Sonoda
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Music》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Let's all fully enjoy the Flower Festival together, as μ's!

name: “Full-Bloom Cuteness♪” Kotori Minami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "We Are A Single Light" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: The parade costumes were pretty cute, so I'm looking forward to it myself!

name: “Sunshine on Flowers” Rin Hoshizora
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Crimson Beauty, Maki Nishikino
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named ""Summer Festival Date" Maki Nishikino" in your deck. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 blue character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I've been looking forward to this, so hurry up and dance with me!

name: “Heart's Spring Blooms” Hanayo Koizumi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Music》 characters in front of this card get +1 level and +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your characters with "Hanayo(花陽)" in its card name, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: The Flower Festival's special drinks and Milky Flower Parfait look so delicious! I want to try them all!

name: “Large Flower Bloom” Maki Nishikino
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "We Are A Single Light" is in your climax area, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Music》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 1 of your 《Music》 characters] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: *Chuckle* We need to spread the word to lots of visitors that there's a fun event going on.

name: This Is My Dream World, Hanayo Koizumi
text: 【CONT】 If your opponent has a level 3 or higher character, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If you have 3 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, if this card is in your center stage, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: But I had so much fun singing! So if it's okay with you, I'd like to sing something together next... Can we?

name: Toe-Bean Touch♪ Rin Hoshizora
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's waiting room, your opponent returns all cards from their waiting room except those cards to their deck, and shuffles their deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Full of Energy Guts Pose" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Music》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Wow, there are! It's so beautiful! I've never seen anything like it!
